quote: Michelle has applied her analytical abilities in managing our Google ad-words account to great benefit. Her insights ans research have been invaluable in shaping our advertising strategy. We offer this endorsement of her skills without reservation.

Our Digital Marketing Specialist, Heather, has proved to be very professional in setting up and running my ads on Facebook and Google. I received a lot of input even before signing on agreement. I am happy to be working with the team at Superist!

We have been working with Superist SEO and SEM Services for a few years. I want to thank you Emily Cheuk from Superist. Her expertise and dedication to achieving results were truly outstanding. Their transparency and communication approach made me feel valued and confident in their abilities.

I received a lot of help from Superist - especially with Facebook ads. Lars helped me to focus on the right things and not put everything in the same basket. Thank you Lars for your availability and professionalism.

We have worked with Superist on our SEO and SEM campaigns and they did an excellent job on them. Their expertise in these areas of digital marketing has delivered great results efficiently, and the results have convinced us that we could not have done this easily by ourselves.

My firm engaged Superist for Google Adwords and SEO and we’re over the moon with the results! We’ve seen a substantial increase in inbound leads and as a result we’ve hired two more team members to handle the demand. Very happy to recommend First Page to other businesses.
